caption.p: Sampling locations and results of PPRV antibody detection in livestock and wildlife from Queen Elizabeth National Park (QENP), western Uganda from 2015â€“2017. Livestock sampling locations with seropositive animals are shown. District borders are shown in grey and the national border with DRC is shown with a thicker black line. The asterisk indicates Mweya Peninsula in the right image in 2017. The Kazinga channel connects Lake Edward (left) with Lake George (right) and divides QENP. The tree cover within QENP indicates the location of Maramagambo Forest.
